Posts.Content: TheBestAround wrote: I was researching into the gene about a family that has had a history of breast/ovarian cancer. My wife is 26. On her dad's side of the family, multiple people have had these cancers. However, neither of her parents have had cancer in this area. Does she have the BRCA gene? The one where you have a 50%-85% of developing one of these cancers? Thanks. Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Worried about my wife in her 20's TheBestAround besa
